attributes.action: PAY ALL PENSIONERS IRRESPECTIVE THE CURRENT RATE OF PAYMENT
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
An exception is taken over British Government policy to exclude the unfreezing of pensions payable to British subjects in New Zealand, Australia, Canada and South Africa.
We as British subjects have paid into the Welfare State  and upon retirement demand that we get the current rate of pension payments including increases which are awarded to pensioners resident in Great Britain.
Those of us that are resident in Commonwealth countries are not a burden upon the United Kingdom for any other benefits other than that which is rightfully ours - OUR PENSIONS , to not receive the "Going Rate of Pensions" is IMMORAL and DECEITFUL.
We as residents in the commonwealth countries deserve the UNFREEZING of pensions, we have paid our dues and expect our rights to be observed
